title: Taiwan will not bow to China pressure, president says after Beijing reunification call
content:
1. Taiwan will not bow to China pressure, president says after Beijing reunification call  NBC News
  2. Taiwan's Tsai Ing-wen responds to Xi Jinping's vow of peaceful reunification with China  The Washington Post
  3. Taiwan says it will resist China's call for a 'peaceful reunification'  New York Post
  4. The Observer view on Xi Jinping’s increasing threats to Taiwan  The Guardian
  5. Opinion | What if, instead of confronting China's rise, we must manage its decline?  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 台湾は中国の圧力に屈しない」と北京での統一要求を受けて大統領が発言
总统在北京呼吁统一后表示，台湾不会向中国的压力低头
總統在北京呼籲統一後表示，臺灣不會向中國的壓力低頭
